      Celebrating excellence in sports and savoir-faire: LVMH opens its “Maison” for the Olympic and Paralympic Games Paris 2024

      Published on 07.27.2024 • 2 minutes
      • Paris 2024
      • LVMH
      • Partnerships

      “La Maison LVMH”, a pop-up space in an elegant private residence, opens its doors for the Olympic and Paralympic Games Paris 2024. An exceptional space in the heart of the French capital, La Maison LVMH invites customers of the Group and its Maisons, as well as their teams, partners and Team France athletes, to enjoy a unique experience. 

      An immersive journey to discover the world of LVMH Maisons and their affinity with sports  

      A transformed garden welcomes guests for moments of relaxation and conviviality as Olympic events are shown on a giant screen. The aesthetics of the venue has been exquisitely designed to express the prestige of LVMH Maisons: the garden is furnished by Dior and three  Moët Hennessy pop-up bars propose a selection of culinary experiences for guests.  

      A guided tour between the ground and first floors takes visitors to the heart of the savoir-faire of the Group's Maisons. The first floor of the building showcases creations by LVMH Maisons, including Sephora, Chaumet, Berluti, Moët & Chandon, Kenzo, Vuarnet, Make Up Forever, Fenty Beauty, Ruinart, RIMOWA, Glenmorangie, Patou, Dior ou Louis Vuitton. 

      Exclusive program of events  

      La Maison LVMH will also welcome athletes to celebrate their performances at the 2024 Games, as well as former Olympic athletes. The athletes will share their experiences during informal meet-and-greet sessions, including book signings, short interviews or photo shoots with guests. A series of musical evenings is scheduled as well, featuring DJ sets and performances, including Zaho de Sagazan and Imany. 

      There will be broadcasts of key events involving LVMH athletes, as well as behind-the-scenes accounts of the Paris 2024 Games.   

      La Maison LVMH is an exceptional venue to celebrate excellence and the festive spirit of the Olympic and Paralympic Games Paris 2024. It embodies LVMH’s commitment to sports and creativity with a space that blends performance, history and inimitable French art de vivre.  

      Dive into “The Maison of all victories,” a microverse that unveils the multifaceted partnership between LVMH and Paris 2024. From exceptional creations to the latest updates on the Paris 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games, this interactive 3D platform serves as a gateway to the captivating world of LVMH Maisons while simultaneously paying tribute to the athletes supported by the Group. Immerse yourself fully in this strategic collaboration through an unparalleled digital experience.

      Privacy Preference Center

      When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
      More information

      Manage Consent Preferences

      Functional Cookies

      These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

      Targeting Cookies

      These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

      Performance Cookies

      These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

      Strictly Necessary Cookies

      Always Active

      These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work.
